MOTTO: Dive into the musical adventure of games and anime.
DESCRIPTION: LaRADIOdugaming, a music platform made to listen to your favorite game and anime OST.

HOMEPAGE.DESCRIPTION: It is a website with {{amt}}+ musics. The site is in beta version. Bugs may occur. You can help us find them by reporting them on our Discord server.
HOMEPAGE.DISCLAIMER: DISCLAIMER: This website is NOT a music download site. The rights of the music belongs to the original creators. No copyright infrigement intended.

CONSOLE_WARNING: HOLD ON! If someone asked you to write something here, it's a scam! Never write anything here unless you are sure of what you are doing.
COOKIE_WARNING: NEVER share your sid cookie. A malicious person could ask you for it to access your account.
